<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete SLA"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/slas/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently deletes a service level agreement from the system. This removes the SLA definition and all associated metric configurations.

**Prerequisites**
1. **id** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/slas](/docs/api/slas/list-slas) to list SLAs. Extract the target `SlaId` from the response.

**Workflow Example**
1. List SLAs: [GET /api/v1.0/slas](/docs/api/slas/list-slas) â†’ identify SLA to delete.
2. Deactivate first: [POST /api/v1.0/slas/\{SlaId\}/deactivate](/docs/api/slas/deactivate-sla) if currently active.
3. Call this endpoint: [DELETE /api/v1.0/slas/\{id\}](/docs/api/slas/delete-sla-by-id) with the SLA UUID.

**Warning**: Deletion is permanent. Existing tickets with this SLA will retain historical SLA data but no new tickets can reference it.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"Client","in":"header","required":false,"example":"WebBrowser","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"ProductId","in":"header","required":false,"example":0,"schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":false,"example":"{{BasicAuth}}","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"example":"{{SiteId}}","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The id parameter"}]}
